japanese: はーい、いま開けます！
translation: Okay, I'll open it now!

japanese: おはよ、フー君。
translation: Good morning, Fu-kun.

japanese: ああ、来たのか。
translation: Ah, you came.

japanese:
コンビニまで行って必要そうな物、買ってきた。
水とか、消化によさそうな食べ物とか。
translation:
We went to the convenience store
and bought the necessities.
Like water, and foods that are good for digestion.

japanese: 一花の様子はどうですか？
translation: How is Ichika doing?

japanese:
夕べと同じ状態だな。
意識ははっきりしてるが……。
translation:
She's in the same condition as last night.
Her consciousness is clear, but...

japanese:
大丈夫だよ。
熱も高いわけじゃないしさ。
translation:
I'll be fine.
My fever isn't high or anything.

japanese: それでも心配だよ！
translation: I'm still worried!

japanese:
やはり、ホテルにお願いして
お医者様を呼んでもらったほうがいいのでは？
translation:
Don't you think
we should ask the hotel to call a doctor?

japanese:
ごめん、気持ちは嬉しいんだけど
大袈裟なことにしたくなくて。
translation:
Sorry, I appreciate you looking out for me,
but I don't want to make a big deal out of this.

japanese: けど、なにかの病気だったら……。
translation: But what if you got some kind of illness...

japanese:
ううん、ちょっと
疲れが出ちゃっただけだと思うんだ。
translation: No, I think I'm just exhausted.

japanese:
みんなには黙ってたけど、
ここのところ、お仕事をギリギリまで
詰め込んじゃってたんだよね。
translation:
I haven't told everyone,
but I've been working really hard recently.

japanese: そうだったの？
translation: Oh really?

japanese:
１週間のお休みをもらうのも大変でさ。
いやぁ、売れっ子はつらいです。
translation:
It was difficult trying to get this week off.
Being successful sure is tough.

japanese:
（確かに、よく１週間も休暇がもらえたなとは
　思ってたが……その分、事前に働いてたわけか）
translation:
(That's true, I couldn't believe she got a week off, but...
 I guess she worked in advance to get it?)

japanese:
あ、みんなが責任感じることないからね？
私ができると思ってやった結果なんだから。
translation:
Ah, no one needs to feel responsible, okay?
I came here on my own will.

japanese:
というわけで、今日１日くらい
ゆっくりすれば元気になるだろうし、
ホテルで大人しくしておくよ。
translation:
So, if I take it easy today,
I'll probably feel better.
I'll keep quiet at the hotel.

japanese: みんなは予定通りに観光してきて。
translation: Everyone, go sightseeing as planned.
...Huh?

japanese:
は、じゃなくて。
ガンガラーの谷とか、おきなわワールドとか、
みんな楽しみにしてたじゃん。
translation:
Don't say 'huh.'
You guys were all looking forward to go to 
the Valley of Gangala and Okinawa World, right?

japanese:
ほら、ここにいる時間ももったいないし、
早く出発したほうがいいよ。
行っておいで。
translation:
Come on, it's a waste of time to stay here,
you guys should leave early. Go ahead.

japanese: 行くわけないでしょ。
translation: There's no way we're going.
...What?

japanese: 一花を置いていけるわけない。
translation: We can't just leave you behind, Ichika.

japanese: でもさ、倒れちゃったのは私の責任だし。
translation: But still, it's my own fault that I collapsed.

japanese:
ちゃんと自己管理ができてたら、
こんなことにはならなかったんだよ？
translation:
If I had managed myself better,
this wouldn't have happened, you know?

japanese: あんたが悪いだなんて誰も思ってないわ。
translation: No one thinks it's your fault.

japanese: これは私が悪いよ。
translation: I'm at fault here.

japanese:
だから気にしないで、
せっかく沖縄まで来たんだから、
みんなは楽しんでおいでよ。
translation:
So don't worry about it.
Since we've come all the way to Okinawa,
you guys enjoy yourselves.

japanese: ううん、一緒にいる。
translation: No, we'll stay with you.

japanese:
一花の失敗も、一緒に行けない寂しさも……
こういう時だって五等分ですよ。
translation:
Even if it's a mistake on your part, Ichika,
or the sadness of not being able to go together...
it's all part of being quintuplets, you know.

japanese: あはは、困ったなぁ。
translation: Haha, what a dilemma.

japanese:
（行ってほしい一花と心配なこいつら……。
　どっちの気持ちもわかるが、平行線だな）
translation:
(I can understand both their feelings,
 but we're at a standstill.)

japanese:
お前が心配なんだろ。
わかってやれよ、一花。
translation:
We're all worried about you.
Understand that, Ichika.

japanese:
ちゃんとわかってる。
もし誰かが倒れたら、
きっと私だって同じことを言うよ。
translation:
I understand perfectly.
If someone collapsed,
I would say the same thing.

japanese: だったら――
translation: Then%p-2;――

japanese:
でも、私のせいで
みんながどこにも行けないのはやっぱり嫌なんだ。
それも、わかって欲しいな。
translation:
But it still bothers me
that you guys feel less inclined to go because of me.
I want you to understand that too.

japanese:
うーん。
だったら、誰か１人が残るのはどう？
translation:
Hmm.
Then how about someone stays behind?

japanese: 間を取るなら、そうなるかな。
translation: That would be the case if we meet in the middle.

japanese:
このまま言い合いをしていたら
一花もゆっくり休めませんし……。
translation:
If we keep arguing like this,
Ichika won't be able to rest...

japanese: だったら私が――
translation: Then I'll stay behind%p-2;――

japanese: いや、俺が残る。
translation: No, I'll stay.

japanese: フー君？
translation: Fu-kun?

japanese:
昨日、一番近くで一花を見ていたのは俺なんだ。
それなのに気づけなかった責任を取らせてくれ。
translation:
I was the one who was closest to Ichika yesterday.
Let me take responsibility for not noticing.

japanese: 上杉君……。
translation: Uesugi-kun...

japanese: わかった、フータローに任せる。
translation: Okay, we'll leave it to you, Futaro.

japanese: 私もそれで構いません。
translation: I'm fine with that too.

japanese: 私も！
translation: Me too!

japanese: そうね、フー君がいてくれるなら安心だわ。
translation: Yes, I feel at ease with Fu-kun here.

japanese:
なら決まりだな。
俺が残って一花の看病をする。
悪いが、らいはのことは任せた。
translation:
Then it's settled.
I'll stay and take care of Ichika.
Sorry, but take care of Raiha for me.

japanese:
ここに全員いても意味はない。
看病するなら１人でもいいはずだ。
translation:
There's no point in everyone being here.
One person should be enough to take care of Ichika.

japanese: ですが……。
translation: But...

japanese:
むしろ、一花のプレッシャーになっちまうぞ？
お前らの看病したいって気持ちが、
こいつの罪悪感を膨らませちまう。
translation:
Moreover, it might put pressure on Ichika, you know?
Your desire to take care of her
could increase her guilt.

japanese:
お前らだって旅行中に同じ状況になったら、
他のみんなには行ってほしいって思うだろ？
translation:
If you were in the same situation on a trip,
wouldn't you want everyone else to go?

japanese: ……うん。
translation: ...Right.

japanese:
だったら行って来い。
ここには俺が残る。
translation:
Then you guys go.
I'll stay here.

japanese: 上杉さんがですか？
translation: Uesugi-san?

japanese: ああ、１人残ってれば充分だって言っただろ。
translation: Yeah, I said one person staying behind would be enough.

japanese:
……わかりました。
あなたになら一花を任せられます。
translation:
...Okay, I understand.
I can entrust Ichika to you.

japanese:
そうね。
フー君ならいいわ。
translation:
That's right.
Fu-kun is fine.

japanese:
なら決まりだな。
俺が残って一花の看病をする。
悪いが、らいはのことは任せた。
translation:
Then it's settled.
I'll stay and take care of Ichika.
Sorry, but take care of Raiha for me.

japanese: 一花は俺に任せてくれ。
translation: Leave Ichika to me.

japanese: でも……。
translation: But...

japanese:
昨日、一番近くで一花を見てたのは俺だ。
なのに倒れるまで不調に気がつけなかった。
その責任を取らせてくれ。
translation:
I was the one who was closest to Ichika yesterday.
And yet, I didn't notice that she was unwell until
she collapsed. Let me take responsibility for that.

japanese: 責任なんて言い出したら、みんな同じ。
translation:
If you start talking about responsibility,
everyone is responsible.

japanese:
……俺は、一花の恋人なんだ。
こんなんじゃ自分が許せないんだよ。
translation:
...I'm Ichika's boyfriend.
I wouldn't be able to forgive myself.

japanese: こ、恋人……ですか。
translation: Her b-boyfriend...you say.

japanese: もう……。
translation: Come on...

japanese:
普段は全然なのに、こういう時に
さらっと言えちゃうのがフー君のズルいところだわ。
反論できないじゃない。
translation:
It's hard to argue back when you say 
things you don't usually say.

japanese: うん、フータローに任せるしかない。
translation:
Yeah, we have no choice but to leave it to you,
Futaro.

japanese: 上杉さんが看ていてくれるなら安心です。
translation:
I feel relieved
knowing that you'll be taking care of her, Uesugi-san.

japanese: ええ、私もです。
translation: Yes, me too.

japanese:
なら決まりだな。
俺が残って一花の看病をする。
悪いが、らいはのことは任せた。
translation:
Then it's settled.
I'll stay and take care of Ichika.
Sorry, but take care of Raiha for me.

japanese: そこはバッチリ任されちゃいます！
translation: You can count on me for that!

japanese: らいは、ちゃんとみんなの言うことを聞くんだぞ。
translation: Raiha, make sure you listen to everyone, okay?

japanese:
もう、わかってるよ。
そんなに子どもじゃないんだから。
translation:
Oh come on, I know already.
I'm not a child.

japanese: では、一花のことをお願いします。
translation: Then, please take care of Ichika.

japanese:
なにかあったらすぐ連絡して。
遠慮なんてしないでよ？
translation:
If anything happens, contact us immediately.
Don't hesitate to do so.

japanese: ああ、わかった。
translation: Okay, got it.

japanese: みんな、心配かけてごめんね。
translation: Sorry for making you all worry.

japanese:
謝る前に、体をちゃんと休めなさい。
フー君の言うことを聞いて安静にしてるのよ？
translation:
Before apologizing, make sure to rest properly.
Listen to what Fu-kun says and rest.

japanese:
うん。
いってらっしゃい。
translation:
Yeah.
Take care.
